BIO

I am a Software Developer Engineer with experience in building Web Technologies.

For the past 1.5 years, I am working as a Software Engineer Intern at Highradius Technologies in the Autonomous Collections Team which included development on technological tracks like HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, React-JS, Redux, Redux Sagas, Highcharts, Material-UI(V4), Core Java, Servlets, Hibernate, Spring MVC, SQL, Git, and JIRA.

Connect me at pritish.budhiraja@gmail.com ~ for opportunities!
